QuestData.Title: Broker's Bounty: Valdinar the Curseborn
QuestData.Description:
A spike-armored Mawsworn named Valdinar the Curseborn is hampering the efforts of the Cartel in Korthia.
Anyone who exterminates this evil will be rewarded.
Use caution. Valdinar is a powerful foe. You may require several allies to defeat him.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thanks to you, Valdinar the Curseborn will no longer hinder Cartel Xy here in Korthia.
You have my personal thanks as well, Maw Walker. I see many great things in our future.
Please accept this reward as a token of our gratitude.
